languages.text: {n}После реплики Данрока прорывает уже всех. На мостике поднимается анархический гвалт. Ваши офицеры, не каждый день сталкивающиеся с подобными интересными развлечениями, более не способны держать в себе поднявшуюся в их душах бурю эмоций.{/n}

{n}Danrok's comment bursts the dam. There is an anarchic uproar on the bridge. Your officers, who are not often exposed to such entertainment, are no longer able to contain the tempest of emotions swirling inside them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}После реплики Данрока прорывает уже всех. На мостике поднимается анархический гвалт. Ваши офицеры, не каждый день сталкивающиеся с подобными интересными развлечениями, более не способны держать в себе поднявшуюся в их душах бурю эмоций.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok's comment bursts the dam. There is an anarchic uproar on the bridge. Your officers, who are not often exposed to such entertainment, are no longer able to contain the excitement that has risen in their souls.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le commentaire de Danrok est la goutte d'eau, et un rugissement cacophonique secoue tout le pont. Vos officiers, rarement exposés à un tel divertissement, ne peuvent plus contenir le fou rire qu'ils réprimaient.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok's comment bursts the dam. There is an anarchic uproar on the bridge. Your officers, who are not often exposed to such entertainment, are no longer able to contain the tempest of emotions swirling inside them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commentaire de Danrok est la goutte d'eau, et un rugissement cacophonique secoue tout le pont. Vos officiers, rarement exposés à un tel divertissement, ne peuvent plus contenir le fou rire qu'ils réprimaient.{/n}

languages.text: {n}丹罗克的点评打破了沉默的堤坝，舰桥陷入了混乱的骚动之中。你的军官平时很少会接触到这样的娱乐方式，此刻已经无法继续压抑内心中情感的风暴了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok's comment bursts the dam. There is an anarchic uproar on the bridge. Your officers, who are not often exposed to such entertainment, are no longer able to contain the tempest of emotions swirling inside them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}丹罗克的点评打破了沉默的堤坝，舰桥陷入了混乱的骚动之中。你的军官平时很少会接触到这样的娱乐方式，此刻已经无法继续压抑内心中情感的风暴了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Danroks Kommentar bringt den Damm zum Bersten. Auf der Brücke entsteht ein anarchischer Aufruhr. Eure Offiziere, denen nicht oft eine solche Unterhaltung geboten wird, können den Sturm der Emotionen nicht länger zurückhalten, der in ihnen tost.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok's comment bursts the dam. There is an anarchic uproar on the bridge. Your officers, who are not often exposed to such entertainment, are no longer able to contain the tempest of emotions swirling inside them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Danroks Kommentar bringt den Damm zum Bersten. Auf der Brücke entsteht ein anarchischer Aufruhr. Eure Offiziere, denen nicht oft eine solche Unterhaltung geboten wird, können den Sturm der Emotionen nicht länger zurückhalten, der in ihnen tost.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El comentario de Danrok crea un auténtico revuelo. La gente del puente grita de forma descontrolada. Tus oficiales, que no están acostumbrados a divertirse tanto, son incapaces de contener la emoción que sienten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok's comment bursts the dam. There is an anarchic uproar on the bridge. Your officers, who are not often exposed to such entertainment, are no longer able to contain the tempest of emotions swirling inside them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El comentario de Danrok crea un auténtico revuelo. La gente del puente grita de forma descontrolada. Tus oficiales, que no están acostumbrados a divertirse tanto, son incapaces de contener la emoción que sienten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ダンロックの発言で、まるでダムが決壊したようだった。ブリッジで無秩序な騒ぎが巻き起こる。このようなエンターテインメントには滅多に触れることのない士官たちは、彼らの中で渦巻く感情の嵐を抑えることができなくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok's comment bursts the dam. There is an anarchic uproar on the bridge. Your officers, who are not often exposed to such entertainment, are no longer able to contain the tempest of emotions swirling inside them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ダンロックの発言で、まるでダムが決壊したようだった。ブリッジで無秩序な騒ぎが巻き起こる。このようなエンターテインメントには滅多に触れることのない士官たちは、彼らの中で渦巻く感情の嵐を抑えることができなくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Danrok'un yorumu, bardağı taşıran son damla oluyor. Köprüde düzensiz bir gürültü kopuyor. Bu tür bir eğlenceye sık sık maruz kalmayan subaylar, içlerinde biriken duygu fırtınalarını muhafaza etmeyi daha fazla başaramıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok's comment bursts the dam. There is an anarchic uproar on the bridge. Your officers, who are not often exposed to such entertainment, are no longer able to contain the tempest of emotions swirling inside them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok'un yorumu bardağı taşıran son damla oluyor. Köprüde düzensiz bir gürültü kopuyor. Bu tip bir eğlenceye sık sık maruz kalmayan subaylar içlerinde biriken duygu fırtınalarını muhafaza etmeyi daha fazla başaramıyorlar.{/n}
